title: Repairs
fullText:
Repairs to existing electrical installations of site supplies for connectable electrical installations or parts thereof may be effected using methods, fixtures and fittings that were acceptable when that part of the electrical installation was originally installed or with methods, fixtures and fittings currently available as direct replacement, provided that the methods satisfy the fundamental safety principles of Part 1 of AS/NZS 3000.
In New Zealand, see Clause 2.4.2 for service pillar repair requirements.
